Package presenters.gui

Class WarGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • presenters.gui.GUI
      • presenters.gui.WarGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, GameIO, WarIO
    public class WarGUI
extends GUI
implements WarIO, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class implements the WarIO interface using Swing to create a GUI to play the game.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class presenters.gui.GUI

        frame, panel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      WarGUI()
      This creates a new GUI window through which the user will interact with to play War.

      • changePlayer

        public void changePlayer​(java.lang.String username)
        This method should change the current user to username and then informers the user of this change.
        Specified by:
        changePlayer in interface WarIO
        Parameters:

      • displayBoard

        public void displayBoard​(java.lang.String card1,
                         java.lang.String card2,
                         int pileSize,
                         java.lang.String username1,
                         java.lang.String username2)
        This method should display the top of both of the War piles.
        Specified by:
        displayBoard in interface WarIO
        Parameters:
        card1 - a string representation of the card on the first War pile to be displayed.
        card2 - a string representation of the card on the second War pile to be displayed.
        pileSize - an int representation of the size of the War piles.
        username1 - a string representation of the one of the player's username.
        username2 - a string representation of the other player's username.

      • stall

        public void stall()
        This method takes a keyboard or mouse input from the user and continues the game once the input is received. Acts to stall the game so that the players can look at the current state of the game.
        Specified by:
        stall in interface WarIO
